params._addresses: Array of contract addresses to be added

params._addressType: The type of contracts stored in this registry
params._owner: The address to set as owner of the contract

returns._0: True if the address is contained, false otherwise.
Returns the next address in the list

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._address: The address to remove from the linked list.
params._previousContract: The address positionally located before the address that will be deleted. This may be the SENTINEL address if the list contains one contract address

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returns._0: The address at the start of the list

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

AddressAdded(address).notice: Emmitted when a contract has been added to the registry

AddressRemoved(address).notice: Emmitted when a contract has been removed to the registry

AllAddressesCleared().notice: Emitted when all the registry addresses are cleared

addAddresses(address[]).notice: Adds addresses to the linked list. Will revert if the address is already in the list.  Can only be called by the Registry owner.

addressType().notice: Storage field for what type of contract this Registry is storing

clearAll().notice: Removes every address from the list

constructor.notice: Contract constructor sets addressType, intializes list and transfers ownership

contains(address).notice: Determines whether the list contains the given address

end().notice: Exposes the end of the list

getAddresses().notice: Returns an array of all contract addresses in the linked list

removeAddress(address,address).notice: Removes an address from the linked list. Can only be called by the Registry owner.

start().notice: Gives the address at the start of the list

userdoc.notice: A registry to hold Contract addresses.  Underlying data structure is a singly linked list.
